item.title: About
item.description: I am software engineer from Rotterdam, the Netherlands. My expertise is in backend software, particulary around data-intensive applications. Specialties: Data Engineering Containerization / Kubernetes / Cloud Native apps AWS / Azure DevOps, Infrastructure as Code Python / Java I work as a freelancer/contractor. GitHub: https://github.com/rolanddb LinkedIn: https://nl.linkedin.com/in/rolanddeboo Email: roland at giraffesoftware dot nl
